actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A joint resolution to continue certain programs, transactions, and activities with respect to the people on Taiwan, pending further legislation, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the President to continue relations with Taiwan as provided in the December 30, 1978, Executive memorandum. Prohibits conducting such relations through the American Institute in Taiwan until Congress specifically provides for such relations.

titles.title: A joint resolution to continue certain programs, transactions, and activities with respect to the people on Taiwan, pending further legislation, and for other purposes.
